title: BRIEF-Community Health Systems Unit Entered Into Fourth Amendment
text: March 26, 2018 / 11:41 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Community Health Systems Unit Entered Into Fourth Amendment Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Community Health Systems Inc: * COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS- ON MARCH 23, CO, UNIT ENTERED INTO FOURTH AMENDMENT, RESTATEMENT AGREEMENT TO AGREEMENT DATED AS OF JULY 25, 2007 -SEC FILING * COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS - ‍AGREEMENT PERMITS BORROWER TO INCUR DEBT UNDER EITHER ABL FACILITY UP TO $1 BILLION/ MAINTAIN ASSET-BACKED SECURITIZATION PROGRAM​ * COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS INC - ‍REVOLVING CREDIT COMMITMENTS WILL BE REDUCED TO $425 MILLION UPON EFFECTIVENESS OF CONTEMPLATED ABL FACILITY​ Source text: [ bit.ly/2upd7TI ] Further company coverage:
